verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For of Him and through Him
And to Him are all things
For of Him and through Him
And to Him are all things

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
To Him be glory
To Him be glory
To Him be glory
Forever, amen

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O the depth of the riches both
Of the wisdom and knowledge of God
How unsearchable are
His judgments and His ways
